column8: The Office of The Privacy Commissioner (OPC)
column13: In FY23, Spark people reported 140 data breaches for investigation, with 28 meeting the Privacy Act criteria for notification to affected individuals and the Office of the Privacy Commissioner (OPC). Most notifiable breaches involved fraudsters impersonating individuals using personal information obtained from non-Spark sources, such as compromised online accounts or phishing (where fraudsters trick individuals into sharing their personal information).

column6: Legal actions for anti-competitive behavior, anti-trust, and monopoly practices
column13: Spark notified impacted customers and the OPC of unauthorized access to some MySpark and Xtra Mail accounts. These incidents generally occur when individuals enter their credentials into a phishing website or use the same password on other online platforms, which have subsequently been compromised and their credentials harvested.

column6: Legal actions for anti-competitive behavior, anti-trust, and monopoly practices
column13: Under our Code of Ethics, all Spark people are responsible for ensuring we behave ethically and comply fully with all applicable laws and regulations. Spark's Legal and Compliance Policy sets out the specific accountabilities that our people have for complying with the law.

A responsible approach to tax refers to a commitment by individuals, businesses, and organizations to fulfil their tax obligations in a lawful, transparent, and ethical manner. It involves complying with tax laws and regulations while considering broader social and ethical considerations.

A transparent approach to tax refers to openly and comprehensively disclosing relevant financial information related to taxes. It involves providing clear, accurate, and easily understandable information to tax authorities, stakeholders, and the public.

column13: An electric vehicle (EV) is powered, either partially or entirely, by electricity. Unlike traditional internal combustion engine vehicles that rely on gasoline or diesel, electric cars use electric power stored in batteries or obtained from an external source. \t
column24: Location from Greenhouse Gas Inventory page 9

column13: The most common type of hybrid vehicle is the hybrid electric vehicle (HEV), which typically combines an internal combustion engine (usually gasoline-powered) with an electric propulsion system. Hybrid technology aims to improve fuel efficiency, reduce emissions, and enhance overall performance.
column24: Location from Greenhouse Gas Inventory page 9

column13: To contain growth in business travel, we have implemented a new sign-off process for international travel. Spark has also built quarterly travel data into its sustainability dashboard to maintain greater oversight and determine if further action is required to manage business travel.
column24: Location from Greenhouse Gas Inventory page 10

column13: Reporting emissions every quarter refers to documenting and disclosing information about the amount of greenhouse gas emissions produced by a business or organization every quarter, representing three months. This reporting is often part of environmental sustainability initiatives, compliance with regulations, or voluntary efforts to monitor and reduce the environmental impact of operations.
column24: Location from Greenhouse Gas Inventory page 10

column13: An emissions reduction squad could refer to a team or Group of individuals dedicated to implementing strategies and initiatives aimed at reducing carbon emissions or other pollutants. Such efforts could involve promoting energy efficiency, transitioning to renewable energy sources, improving transportation systems, and adopting sustainable practices within an organization or community.
column24: Location from Greenhouse Gas Inventory page 10

column13: An Emissions Reduction Program is a structured set of initiatives, strategies, and actions implemented by individuals, organizations, or governments to mitigate or reduce the emission of greenhouse gases (GHGs) and other pollutants into the atmosphere. Such programs aim to contribute to environmental sustainability, combat climate change, and achieve specific emission reduction targets.
column24: Location from Greenhouse Gas Inventory page 10
